long_description: we've got you covered. only medcall offers phone and video-based access exclusively to emergency medicine physicians for both workplace injury and general telehealth. as employers face the urgency to do more with less, the need to offer workers quick and convenient quality emergency care, is essential. medcall's platform gives your workers 24/7 access to an emergency care so you'll be in a better position to meet your employees' needs and your organization's financial goals. medcall brings together innovative telemedicine technologies and uncompromising service to deliver the highest quality of care when and where people need it most. your employees don't need the "middle man" â€“ talk directly to an emergency physician. medcall provides significant advantage over local care and traditional nurse triage programs. medcall clients and partners count on the time, money, and efficiency savings of medcall's telehealth and injury reporting services. offering phone and video-based telehealth consults with dedicated emergency medicine physicians for both workplace injury and general telehealth.
generated_description: medcall advisors is a telehealth service provider based in wilmington, north carolina. the company specializes in offering phone and video-based telehealth consultations with dedicated emergency medicine physicians for workplace injuries and general telehealth needs. medcall's platform provides 24/7 access to emergency care, aiming to reduce wait times and costs associated with traditional in-person care. the company serves various industries, including construction, education, entertainment, healthcare, hospitality, manufacturing, non-profit, retail, and transportation. medcall's services include injury reporting, telehealth intake, and employee telehealth, with a focus on delivering high-quality care in real-time.
